column3: Concept ACK\n\nTSan suppression looks like the right thing to do for now. But as @ryanofsky mentioned [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/23366#issuecomment-952830424), we have to take a look into the source of this error and make sure that suppressing this error might not cause a significant problem in the future.

Concept and code review ACK 96c7db9373014ce232ab01d11333650c9ddf9ee5\n(I think adding a surpression deep inside the C++ library is somewhat scary, but the explanation in @ryanofsky 's comment makes it clearer)
